metadata.title: CVE-2021-23440 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: This affects the package set-value before <2.0.1, >=3.0.0 <4.0.1. A typeconfusion vulnerability can lead to a bypass of CVE-2019-10747 when theuser-provided keys used in the path parameter are arrays.

criterions.comment: node-set-value: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
